description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.0JZU0FVnvAJ08fVR]{Paradigm Shift}

As a reaction when you would take damage from an ongoing condition (such as @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.v9RNVTqyTyaPchvd]{Bleeding} or @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.8LdyXZl9PeXXFE8O]{Burning}), you can heal your recurring wounds by replacing them with already-sealed wounds. This ends the triggering condition before you take damage from it this turn. At 11th level, if you have a temporary @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.tOpF6qjnlnKc10t7]{Blinded} or @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.D8JvCEmOiWKe2UDx]{Deafened} condition with a duration of less than 1 minute, you can spend 1 Resolve Point to end one or both of these conditions as well when using this ability.
